scripts.bundle: npm run compile && "node_modules/.bin/shx" mkdir -p dist && "node_modules/.bin/browserify" build/main/js-seq.js -s jsSeq -o dist/js-seq.js
scripts.docs: shx rm -rf ./dist/docs && "node_modules/.bin/cross-conf-env" typedoc --options typedoc.json src/main/api/ -name "js-seq vnpm_package_version"
scripts.zipsource: shx rm -rf ./build/source && shx mkdir -p ./build/source && copyfiles -a ./* ./build/source && shx cp -r ./src ./build/source && shx mkdir -p ./dist/source && cd build/source && bestzip ../../dist/source/source.zip . && cd ../..
scripts.dist: npm run compress && npm run test && npm run docs && npm run zipsource && shx echo Finished successfully.
